name: Bealtaine Theatre Festival 2025
description:
We are excited to present a vibrant festival celebrating cultural exchange between Ireland and Canada. Enjoy bold theatre, music, and storytelling as creativity takes center stage.

Festival Highlights:

The King of All Birds (Apr 25-27) - A unique performance blending song, vocoder, and film collage to explore humanity's fascination with flight.

Tom Moran is a Big Fat Filthy Disgusting Liar (May 2-3) - A funny and heartfelt solo show on masculinity, childhood, and secrets.

Story of a Day – Scéal Lae (May 17-18) - A magical, music-filled exploration of everyday moments, perfect for kids.

The Libravian (May 24-25) - A whimsical adventure through stories of bravery for young audiences.
